product_name: Columbia Fresh Pow Snowsuit Set - Infant Boys'
long_description: The infants' Columbia Fresh Pow snowsuit set bundles your precious boy in warm and dry comfort to help keep him happy throughout a day of winter fun. Jacket and pants feature durable shell fabric with Omni-Shield(TM) advanced repellency to provide a protective barrier from the elements and offer long-lasting wear. Polyester lining feels soft, breathes well and wicks moisture; 60g of polyester insulation throughout helps tame cold temperatures. Storm hood adjusts for a snug fit; elastic cuffs help seal out snow; handwarmer pockets store extras and shelter chilly hands. The Columbia Fresh Pow snowsuit set features adjustable suspenders that customize the bottom fit and elastic lower cuffs that help seal out snow.
